/home/john/freesteam/steamcalculator.h

Core class - define steam state in terms of p,T and optionally x To find the enthalpy of steam at p = 10 bar, T = 250 °C,

                        SteamCalculator S;
                        S.set_pT(10.0 * bar, fromcelsius(250));
                        cerr << S.specenthalpy() << endl;
